What book is The movie Toby Tyler or Ten Weeks with a Circus based on?

Follows the adventures of a young boy who runs away to join the circus and discovers, contrary to his expectations, that circus life is not always carefree and happy.

Did you know that the movie Toby Tyler or Ten Weeks with a Circus is based on the book Toby Tyler?

Taken in by distant members of his family after being orphaned, Toby Tyler runs away to join the circus.

  • Internet Movie Database:  6.9/10
